physics: These are physics questions, including topics like mechanics and electrical circuits.
short:
These questions are a little simpler (although not necessarily easy!). 

If you are looking for questions to attempt without an interviewer, these are a good place to start.
investigate: These questions introduce a new topic, and ask a few questions to get a better understanding. These questions are best asked by an interviewer, who can lead you down the right path.
graph: Graph-drawing questions. Click here for some general tips on sketching graphs.
